Entries.Resort_Leaving: 'Til we meet again, I bid you au revoir, ile juste!
Entries.Resort_Shore: Sacre bleu! The water, she is chilling me toes!
Entries.Resort_Umbrella: I do 'ope everything is well at home.
Entries.Resort_Bar: Merci, Gus. Will you join me for a drink, @?
Entries.Resort: My Raoul would so have loved this place. Ah, he had an adventuring 'eart, 'e did.

Entries.57873000/j 153/z summer/z winter/z sprin: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Lewis 64 18 0/addConversationTopic Josephine_Arrives 1/addConversationTopic Josephine_Introduction 7/pause 1500/speak Lewis "Good morning, @. I'm pleased to have caught you at home.#$b#I have a very important task for you."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1500/speak Lewis "The Governor is sending his wife and son to stay here, in Pelican Town!$1"/pause 500/jump farmer 3/emote farmer 16/pause 1500/speak Lewis "Apparently the child's not well, and he's hoping the country air will help. Poor kid...$2#$b#But what an opportunity for us!$1"/emote farmer 60/speak Lewis "They're moving into East Scarpe Inn for the winter, and I'm relying on you, @, to help make them feel welcome.#$b#What do you say?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/quickQuestion #Of course I will!#I'm busy enough.#Isn't that your job?#What's in it for me?(break)emote Lewis 24\pause 1000\speak Lewis "Excellent. I knew I could rely on you, @!"(break)emote Lewis 40\pause 500\speak Lewis "Oh yes, I completely understand! But there's always time for a little neighborly friendliness, right?"(break)emote Lewis 28\pause 500\speak Lewis "Well...yes. But all of us have our part to play.$4"(break)emote Lewis 12\speak Lewis "The satisfaction of being a good neighbor. Isn't that reward enough?"/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Anyway, @, I'm sure you'll do Pelican Town proud."/pause 1500/faceDirection Lewis 2/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/end
